Text: -jonny-, what are the system requirements for playing this file or other large BluRay files without playback issues? I have frequently had the audio disconnect from the video with high-resolution files like these. I would like to play them fluidly.

You need a good graphics card and enough ram, and install CCCP. Sorry I can't be more precise.

A better idea is to get a standalone media player that you can connect to your HDTV:
http://www.amazon.com/dp/B002XVBAKI
You don't need CCCP codecs. Just install VLC.

1280 x 696 / 4,4 GiB
both video and audio good
thank you...

Audio/video: great. 9, 9 / 10.

Movie: 7/10.

Thanks for sharing.
